name: The Abbey of the Oise
description:
DESCRIPTION
This beautiful, historic abbey sets the scene for an exceptional wedding. Discover the serenity of a rare place steeped in history, just an hour from Paris.
This venue can be combined with the CHATEAU OF THE OISE if additional bedrooms and reception rooms are required. Please get in touch for more information or check out their listing on French Wedding Venues.
The estate was originally a combination of an abbey and a working farm and was first built in the 14th century in the French Vexin natural park, it combines the elegance of its heritage with the convenience of modern equipment.
The venue can cater for up to 70 guests for a wedding with exceptional in-house catering from their expert chefs. Locally sourced ingredients and the highest quality are of the utmost importance here. Gastronomy at its best. Allow us to take care of the catering for your event so you can relax and enjoy your day. Carefully selected fresh produce, cuisine that is both traditional and innovative. These are the ingredients that we use to design your cocktails, buffets or reception dinners.
ACCOMMODATION
32 guests can sleep on the estate plus there is a Bed & Breakfast in the village for another 9 guests.
The Domaine has 14 guest rooms for 2 to 5 beds, combining modernity and tradition.
The Manor bedroom
It is no longer just a matter of sleeping in a guest room in the Oise but of a journey through time!
A very beautiful luxury room is at your disposal in a sumptuous setting steeped in history.
In the dining room, you can receive about twenty guests at your table. For intimate events and elopements, have a good evening with friends near the large fireplace.
Pricing:
High season : 3900€
Low season plus during the week : 3100€ (accommodation included)
Getting here:
2h30 from Calais – 50 minutes to the airport – 60 minutes from Paris
For more information, please get in touch, many thanks.
N.B. The head wedding organiser of the venue does not speak English so even though there are English speakers within the team it may be advisable to instruct a wedding planner to help after a booking is confirmed.
